name: Baratie
text: Activate: Main You may place this Stage to the bottom of it's owner's deck: If your Leader is [Sanji], look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
